mapper.sql: SELECT `user`.user_id, `user`.username, `user`.`password`, `user`.salt, `user`.introduction, `user`.avatar, `user`.dept_id, `user`.create_time AS ucreate_time, `user`.update_time AS uupdate_time, `user`.del_flag AS udel_flag, `user`.dept_id AS deptId, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_code, r.role_desc, r.create_time AS rcreate_time, r.update_time AS rupdate_time FROM sys_user AS `user` LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.user_id = `user`.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id
mapper.select: SELECT `user`.user_id, `user`.username, `user`.`password`, `user`.salt, `user`.introduction, `user`.avatar, `user`.create_time AS ucreate_time, `user`.update_time AS uupdate_time, `user`.del_flag AS udel_flag, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_code, r.role_desc, r.create_time AS rcreate_time, r.update_time AS rupdate_time, d.name AS deptName, d.dept_id AS deptId FROM sys_user AS `user` LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.user_id = `user`.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS d ON d.dept_id = `user`.dept_id WHERE `user`.user_id = #{id}

SELECT `user`.user_id, `user`.username, `user`.`password`, `user`.salt, `user`.introduction, `user`.avatar, `user`.create_time AS ucreate_time, `user`.update_time AS uupdate_time, `user`.del_flag AS udel_flag, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_code, r.role_desc, r.create_time AS rcreate_time, r.update_time AS rupdate_time, d.name AS deptName, d.dept_id AS deptId FROM sys_user AS `user` LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON ur.user_id = `user`.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept AS d ON d.dept_id = `user`.dept_id WHERE r.del_flag = 0
and `user`.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
